ol.li:
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED"
This assignedEntity Contains zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PSN"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
This field is valued with the authority who performed the autopsy.

This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PSN"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
